initiatives.title: 🕌 Blessings of Adha 2024: Share the Sacrifice, Spread Joy
initiatives.description: Your Qurbani Feeds the Hungry! This Adha, join us in delivering fresh, nutritious meat to impoverished families, orphans, and refugees. Your sacrifice ensures that vulnerable communities celebrate Eid with dignity and joy. Every donation provides wholesome meals and hope to those in need.

initiatives.title: 🚨 Emergency Gaza Relief: Save Lives Now!
initiatives.description: Urgent Aid for Gaza’s Devastated Families. The humanitarian crisis in Gaza worsens daily—families are starving, displaced, and in desperate need of food, clean water, and medical care. Your donation today provides life-saving support.
initiatives.urgency: Time is running out—act now to save lives!

initiatives.title: 🌙 Ramadan Food Sharing: Nourish the Fasting
initiatives.description: Feed the Hungry This Ramadan. Millions go to bed hungry while fasting. Our Ramadan Food Sharing initiative delivers nutritious Iftar & Suhoor meals to the poorest families, refugees, and orphans. Your generosity brings blessings and relief to those struggling to break their fast.
